#summary Readme for the DotA Replay Manager Filter written in C# (C-Sharp).
<wiki:toc max_depth="4" />

=== Take Note ===

The DRMF# version will only work with the qlog.exe for now.

=== Result Windows ===

   * Select lines via shift or ctrl and click on the column header to copy the lines.
   * Double click anywhere on the listview to clear the clipboard.

=== Drag & Drop ===

   * Drag a .txt file on the DRMF window to load the log content.
   * Drag and drop a .w3g file on the DRMF window to load the replay with qlog.

=== Links & Paths ===

You can click on any website url or path to start/open it.
